body_html:
Alternative impl to #13817

Basically, I think configure.py will be kinda a pain to run through "bazel run" since then all of the paths in the script will have to take into account that they might be in bazel-bin/ directory.

So instead, I would just reccomend having people using TF as an external dep run....
$(bazel info output_base)/external/org_tensorflow/configure.py --workspace=$(PWD)

...or create a repo rule that runs configure.py automatically.
